children.text: Laser Tattoo Removal in Pune - Safe, Effective & Advanced Care at The Skin Firm
Erase unwanted tattoos with advanced laser tattoo removal under the expertise of The Skin Firm. Precise, dermatologist-supervised treatments for all skin types.
What Is Tattoo Removal?

Tattoo removal is a specialised treatment that uses laser technology to break down tattoo pigments in the skin. Over multiple sessions, the body naturally eliminates these tiny ink particles, gradually fading the tattoo.

At The Skin Firm, we use USFDA-approved Q-switched and Pico laser technology that specifically targets ink pigments without harming the surrounding skin. Whether itâ€™s a name, design, or professional tattoo you no longer want, our treatments help restore clear skin safely and effectively.
Signs & Concerns Tattoo Removal Can Address
Unwanted names or symbols
Tattoos that nlonger match your lifestyle or preferences
Faded or poorly done tattoos
Tattomistakes from earlier years
Profession or wedding-related tattoclearance
Allergic reactions or irritation from tattopigments
Why Choose Tattoo Removal at The Skin Firm?

Tattoos can feel permanent, but thanks to modern laser technology, they no longer have to be. At The Skin Firm, we understand that tattoo regret is real and removing it safely is just as important as getting it.

Under the supervision of Skin Specialist Dr. Karishma Singh, every tattoo removal plan is customised based on tattoo size, colour, depth, and skin type. Using medical-grade technology and safety-first protocols, we deliver visible results while minimising discomfort and downtime.
How Our Tattoo Removal Works
We assess the tattooâ€™s age, colour, size, and your skin type to determine the treatment plan.
The area is cleaned, and numbing cream may be applied for comfort.
Advanced laser beams target tattoo pigments, breaking them into tiny fragments that the body clears naturally.
Post-laser, cooling is applied to reduce redness or swelling.
We provide personalised skincare advice to support healing and fading between sessions.

Redness & Swelling - common for 24â€“48 hours

Post-Care
Keep the treated area clean and dry
Apply prescribed ointments for healing
Avoid picking scabs or scratching
Use sunscreen daily on exposed areas
Avoid swimming, gym, or saunas until healed
Follow session intervals for best results

FAQs on Tattoo Removal in Pune

items.question: How many sessions are required to remove a tattoo?

children.text: Most tattoos need 6-10 sessions, depending on size, depth, and colour.
Mild discomfort similar to a rubber band snap may be felt, but numbing creams make it very tolerable.
Yes, but colours like green and blue may need more sessions compared to black or red tattoos.

items.question: Will there be scars after tattoo removal?

children.text: When done with advanced lasers and proper aftercare, the risk of scarring is minimal.

items.question: How long does Tattoo Removal session take?

children.text: Small tattoos may take 15 minutes, while larger ones may require 45-60 minutes.

items.question: Can all tattoos be completely removed?

children.text: Most tattoos fade significantly, but results depend on pigment depth and colour. Some may lighten fully, while others may leave a faint shadow.

items.question: Is tattoo removal safe for dark skin tones?

children.text: Yes, at The Skin Firm, we use safe protocols tailored for every skin tone.

items.question: How soon can I see results from my Tattoo Removal treatment?

children.text: Fading is visible after 2-3 sessions, with progressive lightening over time.

items.question: Can I get a cover-up tattoo after removal?

children.text: Yes, many patients lighten an old tattoo before covering it with a new design.

items.question: How much gap is needed between sessions?

children.text: Sessions are spaced 6-8 weeks apart to allow proper skin healing.
